document.title: CombiLex
document.intro: The lexicon CombiLex 1.0 is based on the Wordlist of the Dutch Language 2005, source file (BWNT05 2.0), e-Lex 1.0 and the Reference Lexicon for Dutch (RBN 2.0). CombiLex 1.0 consists of two files: 1) a tab-separated file in which the first column contains the lemm...

access.title: available for non-commercial and commercial organisations; user licence required
